BEFORE:
self.l1.flatten_parameters()

        a, h = self.l1(state, hidden)
        a = F.relu(self.l2(a))
        return self.max_action * a, h
AFTER:
if self.recurrent:
            self.l1.flatten_parameters()
            a, h = self.l1(state, hidden)
        else:
            a, h = self.l1(state), None

        a = self.l2(a)
        a = F.relu(self.l3(a))
        return self.max_action * torch.tanh(a), h
